tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Signatures (
    signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collected_signature TEXT,
    reference_signature TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE collected_signatures (
    signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signature_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE reference_signatures (
    reference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reference_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CollectedSignatures (
    signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    signature_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE ReferenceSignatures (
    reference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reference_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE SignatureMatches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collected_signature_id INT,
    reference_signature_id INT,
    match_result BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE AuthenticationLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE UserAuthentication (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    password_hash CHAR(64)
)
